title: Transfering to Japanese Server
body: I'll be transfering to the Japanese League of Legends server shortly due to me currently living in Japan. Does anyone know how the MMR is affected from NA to Japan? If I was Diamond on NA and did my placements on the Japanese server will I still place around the same?

replies.body:
Since you've already completed placements this season, you'll need to play one ranked game on the Japan server to be seeded there.  Your MMR itself won't change, but you could move up or down tiers/divisions based on the MMR of the other players on the Japan server. 

Check out the [Account Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ#h2q3) for more detailed information :D
I hadn't done my placements this season on my account I transferred, but it still placed me after only one game. Is this an error?

This was a bug soon after the launch of the JP server (should be fixed now).  Can find out more information from a post on the JP boards [here](http://boards.jp.leagueoflegends.com/ja-jp/c/game-discussion/BJqnl5m1-ioiciciiiuiiaiizasai1-10)

..
Sayonara
Not meant to be a mean/troll comment btw.  Hope you have fun over there.
